channel.title: Containers on Introduction to Parallelism and Supercomputing Workflows
channel.description: Recent content in Containers on Introduction to Parallelism and Supercomputing Workflows

item.title: Singularity
item.description: Singularity is a container platform. It targets HPC. A Singularity container built on your laptop should be able to run on most of the world’s HPC clusters. Useful links: Use with Singularity (Pawsey User Documentation.) Pawsey-Provided Container Images (Pawsey User Documentation.) Singularity Quickstart Guide (External)

item.title: Should I use a container?
item.description: Should I use a container? Machine Learning Data Processing Any project with many software dependencies.
